sentence.Network_en: He found himself staring at an extraordinary architectural confection of old and new.
sentence.Network_cn: 他发现自己盯着一座新旧结合的建筑精品看出了神。

sentence.Network_en: I have no tooth for confection.
And, curled about the brim of this confection was the perkiest of green ostrich plumes.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the general sense 'something made by mixing', especially a medicinal preparation): via Old French from Latin confectio(n-), from conficere 'put together' (see confect)

entry.def: You can refer to a sweet food that someone has made as a confection .

example.ex: ...a confection made with honey and nuts.
example.tran: 用蜂蜜和坚果制成的甜食

entry.def: A confection is something that has been made or built and is very complicated or decorated.

example.ex: He found himself staring at an extraordinary architectural confection of old and new.
example.tran: 他发现自己盯着一座新旧结合的建筑精品看出了神。

means.word_mean: 2. the act of creating something (a medicine or drink or soup etc.) by compounding or mixing a variety of components

auth_sentence.content: He knew he could manufacture the high-souled confection that his readers wanted.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He knew he could manufacture the high-souled confection that his readers wanted.

auth_sentence.content: Slarta John's gruff Brummie MC-ing on "Jump 'n' Shout" ripped apart notions of that LP being a purely summery confection.

auth_sentence.content: However, the scholarly pursuit of her craft has resulted in an album that's a delicious confection of elegent, bluesy soul.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受到影响的,不自然的,假装的
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ed……的→被影响的
affection[n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适]+ate……的→adj.挚爱的,充满感情的
affect情感+ive……的→adj.情感的,表达感情的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象
stems_affixes.word_buile: effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+ive……的→adj.有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的

disaffect[v.使不满意,使疏远]+ed……的→adj.[政治上]不满的,叛离的
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响

stems_affixes.value_cn: 爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ion表名词→n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
confect[v.调制,n.西点,糖果]+ion某种物→n.甜食,糖果

de坏+fect做,制作→做坏了→缺陷
de坏+fect做+ion表名词→做坏事
affect感动+ation表名词→做出的感动→做作
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
infect[v.传染,感染;影响[思想等]]+ion状态→n.感染,传染;传染病
perfect[adj.完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的 v.使完美]+ion表名词→n.尽善尽美,完美
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
dis分开+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+u+ate表动词→v.实行,完成
in进入+fect做,制作→做进去→传染进去
per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的
